about_the_game:
Explore the Underworld Of Dope Wars Mean Streets

Step into the dynamic underworld of Dope Wars Mean Streets and immerse yourself in an era that seamlessly blends exhilarating nostalgia with modern excitement. With its captivating 90s-inspired art style, every corner of the city pulses with vibrant life and untold thrills.

Meet the Hustlers

Each hustler character carries unique traits and an untold story. They navigate the streets, fiercely loyal to their gangs, striving to survive, battle, and make their mark.

Destroy. Stunt. Explore.

Embark on your adventure through a variety of game modes, each offering a distinct experience and the chance to delve deeper into the heart of the dangerous underworld. Whether you prefer to go it alone or team up with friends, there's a mode tailored to your style.
Currently available is Free Mode, allowing single players to roam the streets, wreaking havoc and earning satisfaction and experience points along the way.
Stay tuned for the upcoming release of Story Mode, Battle Royale, and Team Mode, each of which will unveil the secrets of Dope Wars Mean Streets in thrilling detail.

Explore the Underworld Of Dope Wars Mean Streets

Step into the dynamic underworld of Dope Wars Mean Streets and immerse yourself in an era that seamlessly blends exhilarating nostalgia with modern excitement. With its captivating 90s-inspired art style, every corner of the city pulses with vibrant life and untold thrills.

Meet the Hustlers

Each hustler character carries unique traits and an untold story. They navigate the streets, fiercely loyal to their gangs, striving to survive, battle, and make their mark.

Destroy. Stunt. Explore.

Embark on your adventure through a variety of game modes, each offering a distinct experience and the chance to delve deeper into the heart of the dangerous underworld. Whether you prefer to go it alone or team up with friends, there's a mode tailored to your style.
Currently available is Free Mode, allowing single players to roam the streets, wreaking havoc and earning satisfaction and experience points along the way.
Stay tuned for the upcoming release of Story Mode, Battle Royale, and Team Mode, each of which will unveil the secrets of Dope Wars Mean Streets in thrilling detail.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2012 or later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2012 or later

name: Dope Wars Mean Streets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Atos criminosos
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Dope Wars Mean Streets offers pixelated 90s nostalgia with rich storytelling. Join gangs, engage in shootouts, and explore the underworld. Play solo or with friends for an immersive experience in a retro world.
